
* SBVC 1.0.0 (released finally in YYYY-MM-DD)) is based on the following subversion revisions:
  KEGGtranslator XX
  SysBio XX
  JSBML XX
* SBVC 1.0.1 (released finally in 2015-03-05)) is based on the following subversion revisions:
  KEGGtranslator 407
  SysBio 1368
  JSBML lib from SysBio 1368
* SBVC 1.0.1 (released finally in 2015-03-05)) is based on the following subversion revisions:
  SBVC 187
  KEGGtranslator 408
  SysBio 1377
  JSBML lib from SysBio 1377
* BioPAX2SBML 1.0.2 (released finally in 2015-10-20)) is based on the following subversion revisions:
  SBVC 190
  KEGGtranslator 412
  SysBio 1380
  JSBML lib from SysBio 1380
